definition: simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)

pinyin: jian3 dan1 wang3 luo4 guan3 li3 xie2 yi4
tou2 nao3 jian3 dan1 si4 zhi1 fa1 da2

sentences.english: Get simply very dinkum , calm very thoroughly.
sentences.chinese: 簡單得很純粹，平靜得很徹底。

sentences.english: I can speake chinese only and I know a little simple English?
sentences.chinese: 我會說中文和一點簡單的英語？

sentences.english: Which, briefly, is like an explosion in a spear factory.
sentences.chinese: 簡單地說，就像兵工廠發生了爆炸。

sentences.english: Four measures of anti-interference are introduced briefly.
sentences.chinese: 最後簡單介紹了四種抗干擾措施。

sentences.english: Small seashells have sometimes been used as a primitive kind of money.
sentences.chinese: 小貝殼有時用作簡單的錢幣。

sentences.english: Ene reaction is one of the simple and versatile reactions of organic synthesis in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 烯反應是新近被用於有機合成的簡單而重要的反應。

sentences.english: But there is more to writing a good cover letter.
sentences.chinese: 但是想要寫出一封精彩的求職信遠沒有這麼簡單。

sentences.english: It was also simpler for the manager.
sentences.chinese: 這對於管理者來說也更加簡單。

sentences.english: That situation, in a nutshell, describes the world of designing for debugging.
sentences.chinese: 這種情況，簡單扼要地描述了調試設計界的情況。

sentences.english: Let's look at this 8th variance of this, otherwise, simple example.
sentences.chinese: 這是這個例子的第8個變量版本，很簡單。

sentences.english: Let me give some brief background.
sentences.chinese: 讓我來簡單介紹一些背景。

sentences.english: Simply pour ingredients, add ice, stir, and enjoy!
sentences.chinese: 簡單的混合原料，加冰塊，攪合，享用。

sentences.english: This makes writing document-processing applications much simpler.
sentences.chinese: 這樣使得文檔處理應用程序的編寫更爲簡單。

sentences.english: But this is perhaps a very simple example of ASCII art.
sentences.chinese: 這是字符藝術方面一個非常簡單的例子。

sentences.english: I have taken leaps and bounds towards a simpler life.
sentences.chinese: 我已經跨進一種比較簡單的生活方式。

definition: after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
this/this kind of/this sort of/this type of
